meanings.sent1: My chummies and I always have fun together.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time with my chummies.
meanings.sent3: My chummies make me laugh with their jokes.
meanings.sent4: She is like a ray of sunshine, always there for me, my chummies.
meanings.sent5: Growing up, my chummies were like family to me.

meanings.definition: To be friendly or sociable with someone.
meanings.sent1: I chummies with everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: She chummies easily with new people.
meanings.sent3: The dog chummies with the cat in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden chummies with the bees buzzing around.
meanings.sent5: In the park, children chummies with each other while playing.
